segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the warm light from the open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate so meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is flooding, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's running down the front of the cabinets, pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands right in it, unaware, and it makes me worry she'll slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the cabinet is open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is climbing on an unsteady stool to get to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is tilting back dangerously; he could fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies, looking so pleased with himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is reaching up, excited for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being sneaky, hoping the woman doesn't turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden is neat and calm, such a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like trouble waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone intervenes before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
